abstract: An effect that dims passthrough video.
overview:
## Discussion

Use this value with the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/preferredSurroundingsEffect(_:)] view modifier when you want to dim passthrough video while displaying a particular view. Doing so helps to draw attention to your app’s content while still enabling people to remain aware of their surroundings.

# systemDark

**Type Property**

An effect that dims passthrough video.

## Declaration

```swift
static var systemDark: SurroundingsEffect { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this value with the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/preferredSurroundingsEffect(_:)] view modifier when you want to dim passthrough video while displaying a particular view. Doing so helps to draw attention to your app’s content while still enabling people to remain aware of their surroundings.
title: systemDark
